title: Kaiserslautern
summary: Kaiserslautern (German pronunciation: [ˌkaɪzɐsˈlaʊtɐn] (listen); Palatinate German: Lautre) is a city in southwest Germany, located in the state of Rhineland-Palatinate at the edge of the Palatinate Forest. The historic centre dates to the 9th century. It is 459 kilometres (285 miles) from Paris, 117 km (73 miles) from Frankfurt am Main, 666 kilometers (414 miles) from Berlin, and  159 km (99 miles) from Luxembourg.
